column1: #Text=2007 FIFA U17 World Cup : Germany eliminates Americans ; sets up England quarter final

#Text=August 30 , 2007 Germany 2 – 1 USA Cheonan Baekseok Stadium , Cheonan Attendance : 15,069 Referee : Craig Thomson Sukuta-Pasu 65 ' 89'Bigalke 90+1'Sauerbier 90+1 ' Match Report Williams 20'Zimmerman 68'Wenzel 74'Garza 46'Ibrahim 46'Urso 75'Dominguez 75'Wenzl 83'Cruz 83'Bates 90+2 '
#Text=Germany beat the Americans 2-1 to advance to the quarter-finals against England at the FIFA U-17 World Cup .
#Text=The Germans had a many chances in the 1st half of the match .

#Text=The Americans managed to keep the Germans off the scoresheet at half time with save from the American goalkeeper along with German shots going wide , until a 65th minute goal from Richard Sukuta-Pasu .
#Text=The United States sent everyone forward to seek an equaliser .
#Text=Richard Sukuta-Pasu took advantage of this in the 89th minute scoring for the 2nd time in the 2nd half .
#Text=Mykell Bates scored in Stoppage time to give the Americans a lifeline .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=John Hackworth ( USA ) , USA coach  I 'm having trouble putting my thoughts into words .

_	_	_	_

#Text=Richard Sukuta-Pasu ( GER ) , Germany forward  Obviously , I 'm delighted with my two goals , but we can still do better .

_	_	_	_

#Text=Josh Lambo ( USA ) , USA goalkeeper  It was a tough match for us .
